name: Oil - A ghost story
description:
Some things are best left undisturbed. 

A puzzle game made for #trijam 42. Theme: "Straight from underground". Additional challenges:

  • made with Godot Engine
  • spooky story 

Your objective is to fetch the key, then get to the gate/car to escape the oil that is slowly filling up the map. Remember that a wrong turn might mean death! Move with arrow keys, and press enter to restart/continue when you finish a level.
